title: Alamos Gold Looks to Lower Mining Costs With Manitoba Mine
description: John McCluskey, President and CEO of Alamos Gold, joins Bloomberg Businessweek Daily to discuss the company's most recent earnings results, expected gold output through 2026, and the company's plans to lower mining costs as it opens a new mine in Manitoba, Canada. Alamos is aiming to produce one million ounces of gold annually by 2030 as it works on expansion plans. McCluskey speaks with Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
